thread.title: Social media video shows arrests of black men at Philadelphia Starbucks

title: Social media video shows arrests of black men at Philadelphia Starbucks
text:
Social media video shows arrests of black men at Philadelphia Starbucks 3:38am IST - 00:45 
Video circulated on social media showed police officers arresting two black men as they sat in a Starbucks coffee shop in Philadelphia, in an event that has sparked accusations of racial profiling. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
Video circulated on social media showed police officers arresting two black men as they sat in a Starbucks coffee shop in Philadelphia, in an event that has sparked accusations of racial profiling. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2HASuad
